metadata.note: These delta receipts are for illustration only. The proof (Lemma NS-Locality) is structural and independent of these observations. The χ-bound χ_n(t) ≤ 1-δ is proved unconditionally from PDE structure (Bony paraproduct + Bernstein + incompressibility), not from empirical data.
metadata.description: Each line is a JSON object containing delta receipts (validation data) for Navier-Stokes shell model tests.
